description: Wattson`s Magnemite was the first Pokemon that he sent out again Ash. During the Gym battle, Wattson tells Magnemite it to use Swift and Pikachu dodges the attack and uses Thunderbolt. The Thunderbolt is so powerful that it knocks Magnemite out in one hit. Watt is shocked about Wattson`s lost but he declares that Pikachu wins the first round.
name: Coil (Tessen)
